Package dev.moriamap.model

Class GeographicPosition

java.lang.Object
dev.moriamap.model.GeographicPosition
public final class GeographicPosition extends Object
A geographic position is a pair of angles that describe the offset to the equator and to the prime meridian (without taking into account the altitude).

  • Method Details

    • at

      public static GeographicPosition at(double latitude, double longitude)
      Creates a new GeographicPosition at specified latitude and longitude.
      Parameters:
      latitude - a value between +/- 90 Celsius degrees
      longitude - a value between +/- 180 Celsius degrees
      Returns:
      a new GeographicPosition at latitude and longitude
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the values for latitude or longitude are not valid

    • euclideanDistance

      public static double euclideanDistance(GeographicPosition p1, GeographicPosition p2, double radius)
      Converts the specified GeographicPositions to cartesian representation and computes the euclidean distance between the obtained vectors.
      Parameters:
      p1 - a GeographicPosition
      p2 - a GeographicPosition
      radius - the radius of the sphere on which p1 and p2 are
      Returns:
      the euclidean distance between p1 and p2
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if radius is inferior or equal to 0.0

    • euclideanDistanceOnEarth

      public static double euclideanDistanceOnEarth(GeographicPosition p1, GeographicPosition p2)
      Returns the euclidean distance between the specified GeographicPosition on Earth. Equivalent to `euclideanDistance(p1, p2, EARTH_RADIUS)`.
      Parameters:
      p1 - a GeographicPosition
      p2 - a GeographicPosition
      Returns:
      the euclidean distance between p1 and p2 with Earth's radius

    • distanceFrom

      public double distanceFrom(GeographicPosition other)
      Computes the euclidean distance on Earth from this GeographicPosition to the specified GeographicPosition.
      Parameters:
      other - a GeographicPosition
      Returns:
      `euclideanDistanceOnEarth(this, other)`

    • getLatitude

      public double getLatitude()
      Gets the value of the angle in Celsius degrees formed by this GeographicPosition and the Equator (latitude of 0.0).
      Returns:
      the latitude coordinate of this GeographicPosition

    • getLongitude

      public double getLongitude()
      Gets the value of the angle in Celsius degrees formed by this GeographicPosition and the prime meridian (longitude of 0.0).
      Returns:
      the longitude coordinate of this GeographicPosition

    • toCartesian

      public double[] toCartesian(double radius)
      Returns an array that correspond to the cartesian representation of this GeographicPosition on a sphere of specified radius. The projection is computed as follows: X-axis = radius * cos(this.latitude) * cos(this.longitude) Y-axis = radius * cos(this.latitude) * sin(this.longitude) Z-axis = radius * sin(this.latitude) and each value is rounded to 4 decimal places for 11.1m precision at the equator.
      Parameters:
      radius - the distance from this GeographicPosition and the center of the XYZ coordinate system
      Returns:
      an array containing the projection on each axis of this GeographicPosition in the order X Y Z
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if radius is negative

    • toCartesianAsList

      public List<Double> toCartesianAsList(double radius)
      Computes the cartesian representation with `toCartesian` and converts the result to a list.
      Parameters:
      radius - the distance from this GeographicPosition and the center of the XYZ coordinate system
      Returns:
      a list containing the cartesian representation of this GeographicPosition in the order X Y Z

    • from

      public static GeographicPosition from(String latitude, String longitude)
      Two format : Decimal or complete Decimal : 2.17 Degree Minute Second : 24 12 35 N
      Parameters:
      latitude - a String that contains the latitude in one of the two format
      longitude - a String that contains the longitude in one of the two format
